programmes.show_description: An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
...Of Murder: Detective drama with Lori Loughlin. While organising a charity event, intrepid second-hand sleuth Jennifer must dust off the clues when a generous donor meets an untimely end. (2016)
While on vacation, a happy-go-lucky family becomes the unsuspected target of a grieving mother who lost her family. Starring Nicky Whelan. (2019)
Thriller starring Chrishell Stause. When a popular talk show host reunites with her college co-host, the show's success skyrockets, but her personal life falls apart (2019).
Troy Story: Sue is taken aback when her informant and friend, Troy, is arrested as an accomplice in an armed robbery.
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Love Is Murder: Dr Sloan suspects that a recent spate of suicides involving policemen could be the work of a serial killer. Mark fears that Steve could be the murderer's next target.
...Beautiful Place To Die: Thriller starring Jesse Metcalfe. A retired detective's quiet life is shattered when a body washes up to shore, but can he track down the murderer? (2020)
Murder In White: Jessica travels to London to help with the stage adaptation of her novel. Can she prove that her friend, the leading lady in the play, is innocent of murder?
Northern Explosion: Jessica investigates the murders of two men in rural Canada.
Proof In The Pudding: Jessica investigates the murder of a TV chef, killed on the opening night of his new restaurant.
Portrait Of Death: Jessica finds herself heavily involved in the New York art scene when a gallery owner is murdered with one of her friend's sculptures.
Deadly Assets: Can Jessica prove whether a Cabot Cove fisherman is innocent of murdering a Chicago hitman?
Murder On The Thirtieth Floor: Jessica investigates the apparent suicide of her book editor in New York.
Time To Die: Jessica investigates after one of her student's is accused of murdering his stepfather.
The Dying Game: Jessica investigates the murders of two men involved in the sale of a prominent New York building.
The Trouble With Seth: Jessica and Sheriff Metzger become increasingly concerned about Dr Hazlitt after he suspiciously disappears.
Roadkill: Jessica travels to Houston to research her new book. Can she help her friend's son when he is accused of murder?
...Drink and Be Buried: Crime sequel starring Dylan Neal. Culinary whiz Harry is hired to work a summer gala, but soon finds himself caught up in a murder mystery. Also starring Brooke Burns. (2017)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

...Day: Crime thriller starring Dylan Neal. After buying a rare cookery book, chef Henry finds himself at the centre of a murder mystery. Can the answers be found within the book itself? (2020)

Thriller with Ren√© Ashton and Cece Kelly. Jenna joins her new school's soccer team to find new friends, but secrets lurk in this seemingly idyllic town and the game is about to get deadly (2021).
A woman invites her mother-in-law to live with family only to discover her unhinged plan to kidnap her daughter to replace her own dead child. Starring Kelly Sullivan. (2018)
Mind Games: The team investigate a homeless woman's claim that she witnessed the murder of a U.S. senator. Meanwhile, Bobby hopes to be named as the unit's new supervisor.

...Death: Murder mystery with Alison Sweeney. A true-crime podcaster investigates a death at a self-help retreat. Can she piece together the clues, or will the killer mute her investigation? (2021)

Meme Is Murder:When the killer posts the crime scene online for all to see, the team worries that they have a social media sociopath on their hands.
The Time Of Our Lives: A dazed Castle must convince the 12th precinct of his reality in order to return to it.

programmes.show_name: White Hot: A Sandra Brown Mystery
programmes.show_description: Mystery thriller with Shenae Grimes-Beech. After her brother's sudden death, Sayre returns to the town and family she escaped a decade ago, to turn it all upside down to find the truth... (2016)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

programmes.show_name: White Hot: A Sandra Brown Mystery
programmes.show_description: Mystery thriller with Shenae Grimes-Beech. After her brother's sudden death, Sayre returns to the town and family she escaped a decade ago, to turn it all upside down to find the truth... (2016)
FMurder: Dr Sloan investigates the murder of a controversial radio shock-jock, killed by electrocution. Will he be able to prove that his initial suspicions are correct?
Left-Handed Murder: Dr Sloan investigates the death of his friend whose arm is found in the stomach of a shark. Developments in the case leaves three women feeling shocked and bewildered.
A Murderous Muse: Can Jessica prove whether the estranged father of a music prodigy is innocent of murdering his daughter's controlling mentor?
Wheel Of Death: The carnival comes to Cabot Cove, accompanied by a major crime spree within the town. Meanwhile, Sheriff Metzger has an awkward encounter with his college sweetheart.
Pilot - Part 2: Sue's first undercover surveillance operation exposes an organised crime ring. Meanwhile, Myles Leland airs his feelings about Sue's temporary placement in the team.
After Castle and Beckett finally tie the knot, the newlyweds go undercover on a murder case at an Old West-style resort and soon 'strike gold' uncovering secrets of the town's past.
Pilot: Carrie Wells is a former homicide detective with an impeccable memory. The murder of a neighbour reunites Carrie with her former partner who tries to convince her to join the NYPD.
...Bone To Pick: Crime mystery starring Candace Cameron Bure and Lexa Doig. When her friend dies, super sleuth Aurora inherits a house, a hidden skull and a spine-tingling mystery to solve... (2015)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
...Bone To Pick: Crime mystery starring Candace Cameron Bure and Lexa Doig. When her friend dies, super sleuth Aurora inherits a house, a hidden skull and a spine-tingling mystery to solve... (2015)
...In D Minor: Whodunnit with Lori Loughlin and Sarah Strange. Garage sale guru and amateur sleuth Jennifer wins a piano at auction, soon learning that its past owner had a dark history. (2018)
